headline: "Magic" Fuels Hasbro's Momentum
summary: "Magic: The Gathering" is powering Hasbro into the holiday season. The 30-year-old card game has become the company's breakout growth engine. But Morgan Stanley Analyst Megan Clapp says the market still isn't fully pricing in how Hasbro's shift toward games and IP is reshaping the story heading into 2026. She joined Bloomberg Open Interest with her outlook.
